skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 80% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted if Ultan of the Shell is on the same team.

Increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn.

skills.desc:
Whenever an ally loses 15% or more of their MAX HP from a single hit, places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on that ally for 1 turn. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff for 2 turns on that ally and then instantly activates it if Ultan of the Shell is on the same team. 

Can occur only once to an ally per turn.
skills.name: Untrammeled [P]
